item.title: Dunwich Builders Legends v1
item.description: Dunwich Dunwich Builders Legends v1 for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One is now available!
item.content:encoded: Dunwich Dunwich Builders Legends v1 for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One is now available!

item.title: Vault VII Beta
item.description: CordlessVII has released the first beta of Vault VII! Currently available for Xbox One and PC.
item.content:encoded:
CordlessVII has released the first beta of Vault VII! Currently available for Xbox One and PC.

Stop by Cord's YouTube channel and say hello!

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v14
item.description: Dunwich Farms v14 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v14 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Added new farming animations for planters
  • Added new farming animations for wild flora that are slightly offset

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v13
item.description: Dunwich Farms v13 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v13 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Added a vendor that sells flora and other craft items
  • Added a shack for the vendor to live in

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Heights v1
item.description: Dunwich Heights v1 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded: Dunwich Heights v1 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

item.title: Collaboration with CordlessVII on Vault VII
item.description: Dunwich Builders has been hard at work on a secret project. That project has now been revealed. We've taken a step into a bigger world. CordlessVII, Ogre, Donald Strong, Commonwealth Charlie and Mimaef are all contributing to this insane vault project!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Builders has been hard at work on a secret project. That project has now been revealed. We've taken a step into a bigger world. CordlessVII, Ogre, Donald Strong, Commonwealth Charlie and Mimaef are all contributing to this insane vault project!

Stop by Cord's YouTube channel and say hello!

Thanks for watching!

item.title: Dunwich Farms Mod Review by AmberFrmThVault
item.description: Pillar of the community and YouTube personality AmberFrmThVault has posted another Dunwich Builders review on her channel! This time she's taking a look at Dunwich Farms!
item.content:encoded:
Pillar of the community and YouTube personality AmberFrmThVault has posted another Dunwich Builders review on her channel! This time she's taking a look at Dunwich Farms!

Note that this is a review for a Work-in-Progress version of the mod. The mod has since been released and has a few more features. Be sure to take a look around!

Stop by her YouTube channel and say hello!

Thanks for watching!

item.title: Remote Cabin Mod Review by AmberFrmThVault
item.description: Pillar of the community and YouTube personality AmberFrmThVault has taken some time out of her busy schedule to post a video about Remote Cabin!
item.content:encoded:
Pillar of the community and YouTube personality AmberFrmThVault has taken some time out of her busy schedule to post a video about Remote Cabin!

Be sure to stop by her YouTube channel and say hello!

Thanks for watching!

item.title: Remote Cabin and Dunwich Farms Streams by Senti nel
item.description: Friend of the community Senti nel has posted a playlist of videos featuring Dunwich Builders mods!
item.content:encoded:
Friend of the community Senti nel has posted a playlist of videos featuring Dunwich Builders mods!

Remote Cabin

Dunwich Farms

Craft Items

Be sure to stop by her YouTube channel and say hello!

Thanks for watching!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v12
item.description: Dunwich Farms v12 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v12 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Removed extraneous craft items
  • Converted bunker pillar to new static
  • Removed rogue floor item
  • Added crashed vertibird
  • Added art icon to Strongleaf
  • Added Strongleaf to workbench food array
  • Fixed issue where Barnacle Meat and Glowing Sea Blossoms were spawning incorrect items in workbench

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v11
item.description: Dunwich Farms v11 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v11 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Fixed issue with MaxHP on Gorilla Panic and Budz Bunny Slims in survival mode

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v10
item.description: Dunwich Farms v10 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v10 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Fixed wood on Grinning Brahmin box
  • Blunt and cigar recipes now craft the proper amount
  • Fixed MaxHP effect
  • Adjusted values on Strongleaf
  • Added description text to all Painkillers
  • Added recipes to Lighters

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v9
item.description: Dunwich Farms v9 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v9 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Removed QA scrap container from bunker
  • Added recipes to constructible objects

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v8
item.description: Dunwich Farms v8 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v8 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Fixed burn effects on Purple Haze and Turbo Killer
  • Fixed changelog
  • Fixed Survival Mode scaling issue
  • Tweaked some numbers on a few other effects

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Remote Cabin Mod Review by Norespawns
item.description: Friend of the community and settlement building senpai Norespawns has made a very fine video about Remote Cabin!
item.content:encoded:
Friend of the community and settlement building senpai Norespawns has made a very fine video about Remote Cabin!

Note there are some very minor spoilers in this review. And also some areas he did not find. Be sure to explore!

Be sure to stop by his YouTube channel and say hello!

Thanks for watching!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v7
item.description: Dunwich Farms v7 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v7 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Changed Painkillers to be MaxHP based instead of Damage-over-Time
  • Adjusted Frenzy effect on Bad Mothafucka
  • Moved Lighters into Lighter Gift Boxes and their Perk is now applied when box is opened
  • Lighters can only be crafted one time now as they're unique
  • Moved Fusion Core drain effect to Major Good Vibes

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v6
item.description: Dunwich Farms v6 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v6 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Added Atom Cats, Brotherhood, Bunker Hill, Diamond City, Dunwich Farms, Goodneighbor, Institute, Libertalia, Minutemen, Railroad and Remote Cabin lighters

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Dunwich Farms v5
item.description: Dunwich Farms v5 for PlayStation 4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v5 for PlayStation 4 is now available!

  • Added smoking, jet, needle and additional worship mats
  • Added lectern worship idle furniture
  • Added lectern scavenging station
  • Added furniture and workstation blueprints
  • Added blueprints workbench
  • Added Gorilla Panic, Grinning Brahmin and Purple Haze blunts
  • Added Bad Mothafucka, Nuclear Wintergreen and Rad Apple cigarettes
  • Added Budz Buddy Slims, El Duderino, Major Good Vibes and Three Dog Special joints
  • Added Blisstex, Fukitol, Turbo Killer and Wild Berry Numb-Numbs painkillers
  • Added Green Jewel Chew, Snuffout and Yaogaui Dark chaw
  • Added Barnacle Scramble food

Thanks for downloading!

item.title: Remote Cabin v23
item.description: Remote Cabin v23 for PS4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Remote Cabin v23 for PS4 is now available!

  • Renamed Atomic Warhead to Dirty Warhead
  • Added Ice Cold Rum and Nuka-Cola
  • Added Gin
  • Renamed Cocktails to Hooch
  • Renamed Speakeasy to Top Shelf
  • Renamed Poisoned Wine to Grimwine
  • Added Caffeination effect to drinks that use Nuka-Cola
  • Tweaked a few recipes for current drinks
  • Moved Nightcrawler to Hooch tier
  • Increased proc chance on Spiked Lurknog to 25%
  • Moved Dirty Warhead to Top Shelf
  • Added Blueprints workbench to garage
  • Adjusted AO markers
  • Added AO markers to garage
  • Fixed up garage lights
  • Moved Christmas tree to Port-A-Diner area
  • Moved some build items from Experimental to Furniture
  • Added light switches to garage
  • Removed and consolidated a few lights
  • Added happiness to cat and dog mats
  • Adjusted happiness on other mats

item.title: Dunwich Farms v4
item.description: Dunwich Farms v4 for PS4 is now available!
item.content:encoded:
Dunwich Farms v4 for PS4 is now available!

  • Initial implementation of greenhouse
  • Expanded build area to include greenhouse
  • Added Horticulture Workbench
  • Added tractor, lawnmower and refrigerator scavenging stations
  • Added tractor, till, lawnmower and refrigerator idle furniture
  • Added Atom's Glow area
  • Cleaned up navmesh
  • Flattened some of the heightmap
